feed.subtitle: An ongoing list of KTamas' Blog posts about futurama

entry.title: Na azert…
entry.summary: After the scare from two weeks ago (‘Futurama’ cast in limbo), TheStar announces that the whole cast has signed up for the new Futurama seasons. [T]he entire voice cast of Futurama has just signed a new contract with Fox after weeks of intense salary negotiations. […] The compromise agreement, with the studio paying more and the actors accepting less, comes after the announcement of a 26-episode pick-up here by Comedy Central.
entry.content:
After the scare from two weeks ago (‘Futurama’ cast in limbo), TheStar announces that the whole cast has signed up for the new Futurama seasons.

[T]he entire voice cast of Futurama has just signed a new contract with Fox after weeks of intense salary negotiations. […] The compromise agreement, with the studio paying more and the actors accepting less, comes after the announcement of a 26-episode pick-up here by Comedy Central.

via Can’t Get Enough Futurama: News: Old Futurama Cast is New Futurama Cast.

*whew*

entry.title: Good news, everyone
entry.summary: A spokesperson for 20th Century Fox Television confirms that the cable net has ordered 26 new episodes of Matt Groening and David X. Cohen’s late, great animated series to air beginning in 2010.
entry.content:
A spokesperson for 20th Century Fox Television confirms that the cable net has ordered  26 new episodes of Matt Groening and David X. Cohen’s late, great animated series to air beginning in 2010.

Content by KTamas for KTamas' Blog
futurama, random

entry.title: WOOHOO
entry.summary: Comedy Central has ordered all brand new episodes of Futurama, and the show has officially gone back into production.
entry.content:
Comedy Central has ordered all brand new episodes of Futurama, and the show has officially gone back into production.
